item.title: Making people admin by coding in client.java
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

look for this

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

if you dont got that then look for…

// End of login procedure

and add it above that

add this under it

checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins() == 5)
playerRights = 2;
if(checkstaff() == 5)
playerRights = 3;

then add these ints…

public int checkmods()
	{
		try
		{
			BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/playerrights/moderators(1).txt"));
			String data = null;
			while ((data = in.readLine()) != null)
			{
				if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(data))
				{
					return 5;
				}
			}
		}
		catch (IOException e)
		{
			System.out.println("Critical error while checking moderators.!");
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		return 0;
	}
public int checkadmins()
	{
		try
		{
			BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/playerrights/administrators(2).txt"));
			String data = null;
			while ((data = in.readLine()) != null)
			{
				if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(data))
				{
					return 5;
				}
			}
		}
		catch (IOException e)
		{
			System.out.println("Critical error while checking administrators!");
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		return 0;
	}
public int checkstaff()
	{
		try
		{
			BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/playerrights/staff(3).txt"));
			String data = null;
			while ((data = in.readLine()) != null)
			{
				if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(data))
				{
					return 5;
				}
			}
		}
		catch (IOException e)
		{
			System.out.println("Critical error while checking staff!");
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		return 0;
}

then compile and make a new folder in your data folder and call it playerrights
and then in that folder you made and named playerrights make 3 text files called

staff(3).txt
administrators(2).txt
moderators(1).txt

save compile and run

hope this helps

Read full topic
